title.rendered: “Your Future, Your Heritage – Gold & Diamond” Event

content.rendered:
ULTRAVAULT YOUR FUTURE

Hong Kong, 2017.06.28

From the worldwide experts of wealth preservation, UltraVault hosted its private event UltraVault your Future, your Heritage in Eaton House Central on June 28th 2017, with supporting partners J. Rotbart & Co., Novel Collection, Fidinam and Fortuna Wines.

YOUR HERITAGE – GOLD & DIAMOND

This prestigious event attracted over 60 guests, including experts from family offices, wealth managers, high net worth individuals as well as industry practitioners from the Gold and Diamond industry. Kicking off with an introduction of private vaults and depository solutions, guest speakers shared their extension knowledge in Gold, Diamonds with the esteemed crowd, followed by an extraordinary wine tasting.

“As a global secured logistics expert with more than half a century’s history, we feel very proud of Malca-Amit’s business transformation, catering to the needs of each private client” – Mr. Ido Tomasis, Director of Malca-Amit secured storage. “UltraVault has been running for 1 year in the APAC region and almost 6 months in North America and Europa now. We guarantee to continue our success with every client of us.”

“What we find most assuring is that UV is being backed by MA, whose reputation in the industry is synonymous to that of excellence. Clients see this independence from the banking and financial system highly desirable, allowing them the flexibility to hedge investment portfolio against financial crisis”
▬ a family office attendee

 

ABOUT ULTRAVAULT

Catering to high net worth individuals, UltraVault by Malca-Amit provides secure, duty free storage and logistical solutions for high value assets as the world’s most exclusive safe deposit box service.

A global leader for transporting and storing precious metals, diamonds and fine arts, known for its excellence in security, extensive liability coverage, seamless worldwide network, UltraVault by Malca-Amit tailors to each individual’s needs and preferences.

Established in 1963, Malca-Amit; a name synonymous with excellence in secure logistics currently has a comprehensive international network spanning over 70 offices in 40 countries, servicing the needs of the most discerning clientele.
